chapter.title: Presentation
chapter.para: The Code2HTML plugin transforms the currently edited jEdit source file or the current selection into a visually equivalent HTML file. The generated HTML files keep the aspect (or very close) of the original jEdit buffer in these areas:
The generated HTML files can then be used for:

itemizedlist.listitem: Documentation: syntax highlighted code always looks better;
Use or not CSS (Cascading Style Sheets);
Wrap code at a given column.
Add custom styles to the top-level <body> and <pre> tags.
